turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to pick up a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! what can i get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for a Can I get a grande iced caffe latte with a sprinkle of caramel in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a Iced Grande Caffè Latte, with a dash of caramel, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, great! and regular milk is fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can I get soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so it is a Iced Grande Caffè Latte, with a dash of caramel, with Soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! and which location would you like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on 35 East Wacker Drive, Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it! It looks like they might be busy right now, but i'll send it over immediately to get it started for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Have a good day.
